category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_4gd_always_register_on_creation
preference.preference_description: Activates the Object Directory Services (ODS) registration of 4th Generation Design (4GD) objects at the time of object creation. The ODS registry feature prevents the creation of duplicate objects across federated multi-sites. Valid Values: - true: Allows 4GD objects to be registered at the time of creation. - false: Prevents 4GD objects to be registered at the time of creation..
